ca.cmput301.team13.taskman.model
Class VirtualRepository

java.lang.Object
  ca.cmput301.team13.taskman.model.VirtualRepository

public class VirtualRepository
extends java.lang.Object

A facade combining LocalRepository and a remote database into one interface.

                                        Task t,
                                        Requirement.contentType content,
                                        java.lang.String id)
Creates a Requirement and links it to a Task.

Parameters:
creator - The User creating the requirement (null to use Task's creator)
t - The Task to add the Requirement to
content - The content type specified by the Requirement
id - The desired ID for the Requirement. -1 if a default ID should be generated.
